definition: to have something made to order
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: You have to pay a deposit in advance when buying a made-to-measure suit.
sentences.chinese: 買一套定做的衣服之前，你得先付一筆押金。

sentences.english: Cotton embroidered vest, cotton vest, size according to customer requirements.
sentences.chinese: 棉線馬夾，尺寸大小可根據客戶要求定做。

sentences.english: She only wears made - to - order dress.
Welcome new and old customers to consult us for copper accessories production according to your drawings.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎新老客戶來圖定做各類銅件。

sentences.english: Can be customized according to customer special specification and color thermal transfer ribbons.
sentences.chinese: 可根據客戶要求定做特殊規格和顏色的熱轉印色帶。

sentences.english: I would like to have a custom-make skirt.
sentences.chinese: 好的，你什麼時候要？我想定做一條裙子。

sentences.english: Each of our instanced dungeons is tailor made for one level range.
sentences.chinese: 我們的每個要塞場景都是按照各等級量身定做的。

sentences.english: Rudoff has a new made-to-measure suit.
sentences.chinese: 魯道夫的新衣服是定做的。

sentences.english: This is an application that is made for mobile.
sentences.chinese: 這個應用程序就是爲移動量身定做的。

sentences.english: You can order a small cross made of brass or from precious metals with precious stones.
sentences.chinese: 你可以定做一個小十字，鑲嵌黃銅或貴金屬與寶石。

sentences.english: It announced in 2009 that it will make the shoes only on a special-order basis.
sentences.chinese: 2009年工廠宣佈這種鞋只能特別定做。

sentences.english: In the town, qinghe County, Hebei province, conduct tailored business enterprise more and more.
sentences.chinese: 在河北省清河縣，開展量身定做業務的企業越來越多。

sentences.english: Orthotics are usually custom-made using a plaster model of your foot.
sentences.chinese: 矯正鞋墊通常用石膏模型量足定做。

sentences.english: Lip surface shape can be customized according to customer needs processing.
sentences.chinese: 脣面形狀可以根據客戶需要加工定做。

sentences.english: It is suitable for all kinds of moulds, easy operation.
sentences.chinese: 可定做各種形狀刀模，裝卸方便。

sentences.english: If even that fails to accommodate you, the company will tailor-make one.
sentences.chinese: 如果你穿着還嫌小，公司還可以爲你量身定做。

definition: to make to order/to have sth made to order
custom-made/made-to-order/to have something custom made/also written 定製|定制
to take sb's measurements/to measure sb up
lit. measure the body then tailor the suit (idiom); fig. to act according to actual circumstances/To live within one's means.
